Mountain or sea? Greece or abroad? Partying or Extreme sports; With your mates or new friends? Many dilemmas, but even more options for your vacation. It is time to decide the destination of your journey after the necessary negotiations and chaotic counterproposals from friends or your own? We remove from the predicament and within eight questions limit your choices to the most suitable to match what you have in your mind.

Mountain or sea? Aegean or Ionianor? Greece or abroad? Family fun or calm? With your other half or with your friends? Many dilemmas, but even more options for your summer holidays. Approximately such a time, moreover, there is always this talk with your partner at home, to decide the destination of the journey after the necessary negotiations. We remove from the predicament and within eight questions limit your choices to the most suitable to match what you have in mind as an ideal holiday.

Mountain or sea? Aegean or Ionianor? In town or village? Family fun or calm? With your partner or with your friends? Many dilemmas, but even more options for your summer holidays. We remove from the predicament and within eight questions limit your choices to the most suitable to match what you have in your mind as "perfect holiday."
1. Which of the following pictures are closer to what comes to your mind when you hear "summer vacation" ?
2. Who will be going on holiday ?
3. What means of transport do you prefer ?
5. Where do you prefer to stay overnight ?
6. What gadgets will not be missing from your luggage ?
7. After the holiday, the profile picture on Facebook will be ?
8. When would prefer to go on holiday ?

Where to go: \n Mykonos and Santorini is confident choices while away from the Cyclades, will not disappoint the Rhodes .

Where to go: \n The Skiathos and Crete , very good island choices for you, while the Chalkidiki is not at all a bad idea if you prefer the < landlubber > seas. If you prefer mountain, Pelion is the golden mean, which combines mountain holiday with beautiful beaches within striking distance. For more mountainous moods recommend with closed eyes Zagoria .
